sentence.Network_en: He had a self-satisfied smirk on his face.
sentence.Network_cn: 他脸上挂着得意扬扬的笑容。

sentence.Network_en: It was hard not to smirk.

英语中的象声词有哪些_百度知道 ... simper： 假笑，傻笑 smirk： 傻笑，得意地笑 guffaw： 哄笑，大笑.

list.abs: 关于渣、屑slag shard shaving关于笑smirk sneerweld=solder
A guilty smirk ; a guilty secret ., 罪恶的假笑 ; 罪恶的秘密.
What are you smirking at ?, 你们傻笑什么呢?
To smirk or laugh in contempt or derision ., 嘲笑轻蔑或嘲弄地假笑或笑.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sme(a)rcian, from a base shared by smile. The early sense was 'to smile'; it later gained a notion of smugness or silliness

entry.tran: (占了便宜或知道了别人不知道的事情时)洋洋得意地笑，自鸣得意地笑
entry.def: If you smirk, you smile in an unpleasant way, often because you believe that you have gained an advantage over someone else or know something that they do not know.

example.ex: Two men looked at me, nudged each other and smirked...
example.tran: 两个男人一面看着我，一面用胳膊肘顶顶对方，笑容里夹杂着一丝得意。

example.ex: A dozen people were watching her, smirking at her discomfort.
example.tran: 有十来个人在看着她，对她不安的样子幸灾乐祸地笑着。

means.word_mean: 1. a smile expressing smugness or scorn instead of pleasure

auth_sentence.content: You can wipe that self-satisfied smirk off your chops.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can wipe that self-satisfied smirk off your chops.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can wipe that self-satisfied smirk off your chops.

auth_sentence.content: Will your colleagues smirk if you pitch the boss?
auth_sentence.res_content: Will your colleagues smirk if you pitch the boss?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Will your colleagues smirk if you pitch the boss?

auth_sentence.content: It started with a smirk and ended with a tantrum.
auth_sentence.res_content: It started with a smirk and ended with a tantrum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It started with a smirk and ended with a tantrum.

sentences.en: He made no attempt to conceal his smirk.
sentences.cn: 他毫不掩饰自鸣得意的笑容。

sentences.en: She had a selfsatisfied smirk on her face.
sentences.cn: 她脸上带着自鸣得意的微笑。

sentences.en: A smirk flickered at the corner of his mouth as he watched my struggle.
sentences.cn: 他看我挣扎的样子，嘴角闪过一丝幸灾乐祸的笑容。
